mapper.insert: insert into tab_usage_frequency(usage_frequency_id, clinic_id, usage_frequency_name, usage_frequency_category, usage_frequency_sort, usage_frequency_remark, usage_frequency_status, create_user, update_user, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{usageFrequencyId}, #{clinicId}, #{usageFrequencyName}, #{usageFrequencyCategory}, #{usageFrequencySort}, #{usageFrequencyRemark}, #{usageFrequencyStatus}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
